autofocus: Yes, Phase Detect, Contrast Detect, Multi-Area, Selective Single Point, Single, Continuous, Face Detection, Live View.
whitebalancing: Auto, Preset (Daylight, Shade, Cloudy, Tungsten light, White fluorescent light, Flash), Custom White balance correction and white balance bracketing features provided
otherfocusfeatures: Focal Length Multiplier (1.6x), No. Of Focus Points (9), Filter Diameter (67 mm)

dustreduction: Yes, Auto, Manual, Dust Delete Data appending
shootingmodes: Auto, Standard, Portrait, Landscape, Neutral, Faithful, Monochrome,  User Def. 1 - 3
display: 3.0 inch TFT color LCD, Liquid-crystal monitor
